content.question: On January 30, 2017, President Donald Trump signed an executive order requiring that for each new regulation added, at least two existing regulations be eliminated. Which combination of government actors has the power to fulfill President Trumpâ€™s executive order?

choices.label: Standing committees and subcommittees in Congress
White House staff and the Executive Office of the President
Party leadership and party committees in Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
